Nationwide | sat chan 1 = Channel 24 | adsl serv 1 = | adsl chan 1 = }} '''Diva Universal Philippines''' is a Philippine television channel owned by [[NBC Universal Global Networks]], in partnership with [[Solar Entertainment Corporation]]. ==Rebranded as Diva Universal== Hallmark Channel Philippines will be last broadcast on September 19, 2010, followed by the launch of Diva Universal Channel on September 19, 2010 of the same day at 6:00 p.m. Simulcast with [[Diva Universal (Asia)]] on the same day with local advertisements. ==Programming== Most of the program are all imported from [[United States]] which includes drama, comedy, teleseries, talk show and reality TV series among other.
